001package com.github.sormuras.bach.project;
002
003import com.github.sormuras.bach.Bach;
004import com.github.sormuras.bach.Configuration;
005import com.github.sormuras.bach.Logbook;
006import com.github.sormuras.bach.Project;
007import com.github.sormuras.bach.internal.PathSupport;
008import java.nio.file.Files;
009import java.nio.file.Path;
010import java.util.ArrayDeque;
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.Collections;
013import java.util.Deque;
014import java.util.List;
015import java.util.TreeMap;
016import java.util.function.Predicate;
017import java.util.regex.Pattern;
018import java.util.stream.Collectors;
019import java.util.stream.Stream;
020
021/** A factory of {@link Project} instances. */
022public record ProjectScanner(Bach bach) implements Logbook.Trait {
023
024  private static final Pattern RELEASE_NUMBER_PATTERN = Pattern.compile(".*?(\\d+)$");
025
026  @Override
027  public Logbook logbook() {
028    return bach.logbook();
029  }
030
031  public Project scanProjectInCurrentWorkingDirectory() {
032    return scanProject(Path.of(""));
033  }
034
035  public Project scanProject(Path directory) {
036    log("Parse directory %s".formatted(directory));
037    if (!Files.isDirectory(directory)) throw log(new Error("Not a directory: " + directory));
038
039    var projectName =
040        bach.configuration()
041            .projectOptions()
042            .name()
043            .orElse(Configuration.computeDefaultProjectName(directory));
044    var projectVersion =
045        bach.configuration()
046            .projectOptions()
047            .version()
048            .orElse(Configuration.computeDefaultProjectVersion());
049    log("Find all module-info.java files of %s %s...".formatted(projectName, projectVersion));
050
051    var projectSpaces = parseProjectSpaces(directory);
052
053    return Project.of(projectName, projectVersion).with(projectSpaces);
054  }
055
056  public ProjectSpaces parseProjectSpaces(Path directory) {
057    var moduleInfoFiles = new ArrayList<>(bach.explorer().findModuleInfoJavaFiles(directory));
058    var size = moduleInfoFiles.size();
059    log("Found %d module-info.java file%s".formatted(size, size == 1 ? "" : "s"));
060    if (size == 0) throw log(new Error("No module-info.java found"));
061
062    var tests = new TreeMap<String, DeclaredModule>();
063    var mains = new TreeMap<String, DeclaredModule>();
064
065    var isTestModule = isModuleOf("test", "test");
066    var isMainModule = isModuleOf("main", "*");
067
068    var iterator = moduleInfoFiles.listIterator();
069    while (iterator.hasNext()) {
070      var path = iterator.next();
071      if (path.startsWith(".bach")) continue;
072      if (isTestModule.test(path)) {
073        var declaration = parseDeclaredModule(path);
074        tests.put(declaration.name(), declaration);
075        iterator.remove();
076        continue;
077      }
078      if (isMainModule.test(path)) {
079        var declaration = parseDeclaredModule(path);
080        mains.put(declaration.name(), declaration);
081        iterator.remove();
082        continue;
083      }
084      throw new IllegalStateException("Path not handled: " + path);
085    }
086
087    var mainSpace =
088        new ProjectSpace(
089            "main",
090            List.of(),
091            // TODO bach.configuration().projectOptions().mainRelease().orElse(0)
092            0,
093            new DeclaredModules(List.copyOf(mains.values())));
094    var testSpace =
095        new ProjectSpace(
096            "test",
097            List.of(mainSpace),
098            Runtime.version().feature(),
099            new DeclaredModules(List.copyOf(tests.values())));
100
101    var spaces = new ArrayList<ProjectSpace>();
102    if (!mains.isEmpty()) spaces.add(mainSpace);
103    if (!tests.isEmpty()) spaces.add(testSpace);
104    if (spaces.isEmpty()) throw new IllegalStateException("All spaces are empty?!");
105
106    return new ProjectSpaces(List.copyOf(spaces));
107  }
108
109  public DeclaredModule parseDeclaredModule(Path path) {
110    // TODO ...
111    return DeclaredModule.of(path);
112  }
113
114  static Predicate<Path> isModuleOf(String space, String... configuration) {
115    if (configuration.length == 0) return path -> false;
116    if (configuration.length == 1 && configuration[0].equals("*")) {
117      if (space.equals("main")) return path -> true;
118      else return path -> ProjectScanner.isModuleInfoJavaFileForCodeSpace(path, space);
119    }
120    return Stream.of(configuration).map(Path::of).collect(Collectors.toSet())::contains;
121  }
122
123  /** Test supplied path for pointing to a Java module declaration for a given space name. */
124  static boolean isModuleInfoJavaFileForCodeSpace(Path info, String space) {
125    return Collections.frequency(deque(info), space) == 1;
126  }
127
128  /** Convert path element names of the given unit into a reversed deque. */
129  static Deque<String> deque(Path path) {
130    var deque = new ArrayDeque<String>();
131    path.forEach(name -> deque.addFirst(name.toString()));
132    return deque;
133  }
134
135  public static TargetedFolder parseTargetedFolder(Path path, FolderType... types) {
136    if (Files.isRegularFile(path)) throw new IllegalArgumentException("Not a directory: " + path);
137    var version = parseReleaseNumber(PathSupport.name(path));
138    return new TargetedFolder(path, version, FolderTypes.of(types));
139  }
140
141  static int parseReleaseNumber(String string) {
142    if (string == null || string.isEmpty()) return 0;
143    var matcher = RELEASE_NUMBER_PATTERN.matcher(string);
144    return matcher.matches() ? Integer.parseInt(matcher.group(1)) : 0;
145  }
146}
